Articles.Content: For example when i try to perform a powered landing on Kerbin, i get so much stutter that the landing fails mostly of the time, i need help. I don't have any graphics mods.

8 hours ago, ShuttlePilot said:

For example when i try to perform a powered landing on Kerbin, i get so much stutter that the landing fails mostly of the time, i need help. I don't have any graphics mods.

I think this is due to the engine's plume/smokes effects hitting the ground.

I remember searching for the same problem, i think there must be a graphic setting that can help you.

I am pretty sure lowering the Terrain Detail will improve fps but first make sure you save because sometimes the already landed vessels get jumpy when you change that.

Or maybe even lowering the shadows or something like that.

Edited January 31, 2021 by Boyster

11 hours ago, Boyster said:

I think this is due to the engine's plume/smokes effects hitting the ground.

I remember searching for the same problem, i think there must be a graphic setting that can help you.

I am pretty sure lowering the Terrain Detail will improve fps but first make sure you save because sometimes the already landed vessels get jumpy when you change that.

Or maybe even lowering the shadows or something like that.

Okay, looks like it does something, but effects? Nah, effects doesn't change FPS for me at all and i don't have shadows enabled. Thank you. Waiting for further replies too!
